ComicInfo.Summary: Royal Flush, Queen High: Part One: Bomb Queen is the dictator of New Port City. She is an unrepentant super-villain who killed all the local heroes, re-wrote the laws in her favor, and set herself up as dictator for life. And the citizens of New Port City couldn't approve more highly.
ComicInfo.Tags: Momma Wong,Ace Justice,Ashe,Bomb Queen,Public Power,Mayor Scott Hilton,New Port City
